name: Death Labaratory
description:
Hell Kitten is in laboratory and  it's being tested by Dr. Sheldon
*Important

1. to play in a full screen       2. to play with a sound turned on

*Controls, WASD; Enter;  Mouse 


*Spoiler (read if you struggle with level with "hands")

I found that many people face difficulty when playing a level with "hands". You need to wait on a high island for the first hand, and as soon as it goes back and can't reach th cat, run to the right without stopping to the shelter in the form of a platform below.
